lead_paragraph: Twenty-eight House and Senate districts were struck down as illegal racial gerrymanders, but the November elections will still be held using them.

headline.print_headline: Court Rejects North Carolina Assembly Map
headline.main: Federal Court Rejects North Carolina Legislative Districts

snippet: Twenty-eight House and Senate districts were struck down as illegal racial gerrymanders, but the November elections will still be held using them....
abstract: Federal judges strike down 19 House and nine Senate districts in North Carolina as illegal racial gerrymanders, dealing blow to Republican lawmakers; move follows decision by another set of judges to strike down North Carolina’s congressional districts for similar reasons; judges will allow use of districts for General Assembly elections in fall.
